linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual core or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 210/5450 or higher
  • Sound Card: Anything
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad core or higher
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 750ti/5750 or higher
  • Sound Card: Anything

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.14
  • Processor: Dual core or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 210/5450 or higher
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Anything
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.14
  • Processor: Quad core or higher
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 750ti/5750 or higher
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Anything

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7,8, 10
  • Processor: Dual core or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 210/5450 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Anything
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7,8, 10
  • Processor: Quad core or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 750ti/5750 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Anything
